page.title: 13SHOPPING IN DITTON PRIORS.
page.content:
{THE POST OFFICE. The Post Office was built in {1885.}Its size is{6 feet by5 {feet. }The opening times are 9a.m. till 4p.m.,it is half day closing on Saturdays. It sells approximately{80 stamps a day to about 25 customers. The next nearest Post Office is in Burwaton which is about 3 miles away. The Postman comes twice a day to collect the letters.The Postmistress is{MRS. P. CHARLES.
{REG MAY,BUTCHERS SHOP. The number of people that work there is{5.}Their occupations are making pork pies,beef burgers and cutting and preparing meat for sale.They sell sweets,ice creams and general provisions. They also sell Â£200 worth of meat every day.They have 2 vans to do deliveries in.
